ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Today's patch message.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... umm, it s been posted a few times that it was just flavor for a possible future quest.  how does anyone know that it s supposed to be mid level when no
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:08 PM 9/19/00 +0000, you wrote:
>
>Well as usuall absolutely nothing for bards other then perhaps trade skills (cough cough) and maybe the weapon? Place your bets anyone REALLY think we got a bard weapon? I bet the Lambent weapon isn't even in the game yet and that's supposed to be mid level.
>
>Adon

umm, it's been posted a few times that it was just flavor for a possible future quest. how does anyone know that
it's ''supposed to be mid level'' when no information about it exists because the quest does not exist. it's been that
way since the temple of solusek ro was opened.
